task: Implement a full Crew-7 AI Crew Marketplace mockup UI

context.product: Crew-7 â€” marketplace for renting, buying, and managing AI crews (7-agent formations)
context.visual_style: Hybrid-C, dark matte background, holographic grid, neon red/white accents, data-mesh faces, premium sci-fi SaaS dashboard.
context.tech: React + Typescript + (Tailwind OR CSS Modules, whichever is already used).

sections.goal: Explain what the marketplace is and give primary actions.
components: Subheadline: 'Rent, Own, and Deploy Autonomous AI Crews.'
Two primary buttons: 'Explore Crews' and 'Create a Crew'
Background: faint Hybrid-C grid with tiny glowing particles

sections.goal: Let the user filter and search crews quickly.
components: Search input: by crew name / tag
Dropdown filters: Industry, Skill Focus, Price Range, Level, XP Range, Success Rate, Availability

sections.goal: Display crew cards in a responsive grid with rich information.
components: Each card shows: crew portrait (Hybrid-C mesh entity), crew name, type tags (Dev / Marketing etc), price per mission / per sprint, XP level, success rate, number of missions, rating, rarity glow.
Hover interaction: slight scale-up, glow intensifies, show quick actions ('View Details', 'Deploy', 'Add to Favorites').
Horizontal scroll row of 'Featured' MarketplaceCards with stronger glow frame and 'Featured' label.

sections.goal: Show details of the selected crew without leaving the page.
components: Right-side slide-over panel that opens when a card is clicked.
Contains: larger Hybrid-C portrait, roles breakdown (Orchestrator + 6 specialists with icons), XP timeline, mission history summary, badges, CTA buttons: 'Deploy This Crew', 'View Full Profile'.

components_to_implement.MarketplacePage: Main page assembling hero, filters, grid, and optional featured row.
components_to_implement.MarketplaceCard: Reusable card component displaying one crew.
components_to_implement.CrewFiltersBar: Top bar with search + filters + sort.
components_to_implement.CrewPreviewPanel: Slide-over detail panel rendered via portal.

styling_prompt.base: Use dark slate background (#05070B to #0B0F19), white text, accents in red (#EA2323) and cyan where needed. Use subtle gradients and box-shadows to simulate holographic glow.
effects: Add hex-grid or data-mesh background using a low-opacity SVG pattern.
On hover of cards, apply transform: scale(1.03) and drop-shadow with red glow.
XPBar should be a horizontal gradient with animated shimmer (CSS keyframes).

animation_prompt.library: anime.js (if available) or CSS keyframes fallback.
behaviors: Card hover: smooth scale and glow.
Metric numbers (XP, missions) count up when cards enter viewport.
Rarity glow softly pulses using opacity + blur.

acceptance_criteria: Marketplace page renders with hero, filters, grid, and at least mock data for 6 crews.
MarketplaceCard is fully reusable and styled according to Hybrid-C theme.
Filters and sort work against mock in-memory dataset for now.
Clicking a card opens the preview slide-over panel.
